description: In recent years, high throughput sequencing of cDNA libraries (RNA-Seq) has emerged as a powerful technology for profiling gene expression, discovering previously unannotated genes, and mapping transcriptome architecture in a wide variety of bacterial species.  CD Genomics provides a fast, one-stop bacterial RNA sequencing solution from the quality control of sample to comprehensive data analysis. Please contact us for more information and a detailed quote.
name: Bacterial RNA Sequencing
